channel.title: A Cold World - Releasing March 27th, 2013
channel.description:
[img]http://acoldworld.org/forum/themes/moderlo/logo.png[/img]
WWW.ACOLDWORLD.ORG
A cold world came up awhile ago, in the forum but it was more then less a test run and fun I was having with the client. But i've became a bit more serious about the whole or deal over time, and well I think im ready to let the community know that on [b]March, 27th, 2013[/b] I'll be releasing ACW to the public.
[img]http://acoldworld.org/content/fishing.png[/img]
[b]ACW has F2P & P2P items and NPC's[/b] in it, and it's all free for the users! We have everything members, and everything free world. The client size has been increased to insure a better game play, and less stress on the eyes. I did some editing with the GUI and of course, added new lands!
The [b]only thing that costs in ACW[/b], is a key to the [b]new lands[/b] which is 4.99 USD Dollars one time fee, but its not required that you purchase this you just won't be able to get to some spots in the game. There are also new lands that everyone can get to for free without a key.
[img]http://acoldworld.org/content/accesskey.png[/img]
We also have an underground economy of [b]drugs, like in real life[/b]. With drugs, comes police so we will be needing police officers that will take people to jail if they bust them dealing drugs! When somebody deals drugs, you will know! SO DONT DO IT IN PUBLIC AREAS Unless you want to get BUSTED!
[img]http://i45.tinypic.com/rieosx.png[/img]
ACW new lands, have many advantages to those who purchase the key, but ACW overall has so many new things in it, that it's fun for all regardless if they have the key or not! I plan to release the game on the [b]27th[/b], and there will indeed be a[size=14pt] [b]EASTER EGG HUNT![/b][/size]
The [b]Easter Egg hunt[/b] will work like this, you find the eggs and you can either choose to keep the eggs or go exchange them for a set of [b]bunny ears[/b] which CANNOT be purchased anywhere or found anywhere, so bunny ears will be VERY rare. It will take about 5 Eggs to get one set of bunny ears.
ACW plans to keep on expanding, listen to the community, add new content and of course strive for quality game play! [size=18pt] www.acoldworld.org[/size]

item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“cyndibal, post:24, topic:508145”]i love how every nerd on the internet criticizes anything that has to do with drinking or drugs and uses the “think they’re cool line”. get over yourselves. it might turn out to be the most fun thing in rsc in years.[/quote]But they do think they’re cool, and there is no way in hell something so stupid would be the “most fun thing in rsc in years”.

item.title: A Cold World - Releasing March 27th, 2013
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

Think for a second, is the criticism you’re given appropriate or not. In this case it is. You started defending yourself right away instead, which only made you look bad.

The docks are indeed on the same height as the water, which isn’t the way it is in Karamja, and the floor is uneven…
The drug dealing seems useless to me. Are you expecting your players to deal the drugs without any benefits? How are you stopping the ‘police’ from just busting people without reason?

Read full topic

item.title: A Cold World - Releasing March 27th, 2013
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

If someone was busted for drug dealing and receive a fine of say 50,000 coins, what happens if they have no money to pay?

Sounds like another low life, drug taking kid with no prospects and had a bad childhood implementing his only life into RSC.

You said, and I quote:

We also have an underground economy of drugs, like in real life.

Then later on you post to say about it’s a game and not real life when somebody criticise? Contradictory?

I really doubt your server will work, but good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: A Cold World - Releasing March 27th, 2013
item.dc:creator: @its2013 its2013
item.description:
@its2013 wrote:

[quote=".S. v2, post:5, topic:508145"]ok so you have blue skin and are popping pills

is this a joke or not[/quote]

Its not popping, your handing them over if you read…Its drug dealing bud. And blue and red skin to be exact. A game is a game, not real life, look at WoW is that a joke as well? Must be a super joke, since there are animal characters.

And, as far as landscape, this isn’t even 1/4th of it. The docks look fine in-game, and I know how to edit landscape… Been doing it for AWHILE now, sorry I didn’t add pillars beneath it to make it look fancy, and have you ever looked at karmaja’s dock? haha thats not level man, then you can burn on mine, and thats what jagex made.

Any how, thanks for the feedback from the two of you, it only makes me strive more to add more retarted shit as you guy’s would call it, or horrible landscapes! But hey thats alright, just don’t play the game when it releases.

Read full topic
